doctor.name: Dr. Md. Joynal Abedin
doctor.specialty: Orthopedics (Bone, Joint, Trauma) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Joynal Abedin is a Orthopedic Surgeon in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MPH, D-ORTHO (BSMMU). He is a Consultant at Chittagong Medical College Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Asperia Treatment Health Care, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Joynal Abedin at Asperia Treatment Health Care, Chittagong is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: 1st Floor, 100, Panchlaish, (opposite to Probortok School), Chittagong

doctor.name: Dr. Raju Prasad Dey
doctor.specialty: Orthopaedic, Trauma, Arthroscopy & Joint Replacement Surgeon
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Raju Prasad Dey is a highly skilled Orthopaedic, Trauma, Arthroscopy, and Joint Replacement Surgeon with extensive expertise in treating musculoskeletal conditions. Holding an MBBS, BCS (Health), and MS in Orthopedics, he has also completed a Fellowship in Arthroscopy & Arthroplasty, making him a specialist in minimally invasive joint surgeries. Dr. Dey is a Consultant Orthopedic Surgeon at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital, where he provides advanced treatments for conditions such as arthritis, joint pain, fractures, ligament injuries, and sports-related trauma. He offers consultations at Belle Vue Hospital, Chittagong, located at Prabartak Hill, 12/12, O.R. Nizam Road, Panchlaish, Chattogram, from 7:30 PM to 10:00 PM. Patients seeking expert care for joint replacements, arthroscopic procedures, and orthopedic trauma management can benefit from his extensive experience and specialized approach.

chamber.address: Prabartak Hill, 12/12, O.R. Nizam Road, Panchlaish, Chattogram

doctor.name: Dr. Showkat Jahan Chowdhury
doctor.specialty: Orthopaedics Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Showkat Jahan Chowdhury is a Orthopedic Specialist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), D-ortho (BSMMU). He is a Registrar, Orthopaedics & Traumatology at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Islami Bank Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Showkat Jahan Chowdhury at Islami Bank Hospital, Chittagong is 3pm to 6pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday).

chamber.address: 3, Sheikh Mujib Road, Agrabad, Chittagong

doctor.name: Dr. Binimoy Baran Roy
doctor.specialty: Bone-Joint, Pain, Arthritis, Trauma Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Binimoy Baran Roy is an experienced Bone, Joint, Pain, Arthritis, and Trauma Specialist & Surgeon in Chattogram, holding MBBS, D-Ortho, and MPH (BSMMU) degrees. He serves as a Consultant in the Orthopedics Department at Chittagong Medical College Hospital. Dr. Binimoy Baran Roy treats conditions such as fractures, arthritis, joint dislocations, back pain, spinal injuries, and bone infections. He sees patients at Basic Lab, Chattogram (Beside Popular Chittagong, CMCH East Gate, Chattogram) from 5pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Beside Popular Chittagong, CMCH East Gate, Chattogram
